pkgmetadata.longdescription: Verbal Autopsy Data Transform for Use with Various Coding Algorithms // Enables transformation of Verbal Autopsy data collected with the WHO 2016 questionnaire (Revision 1.4.1) for automated coding of Cause of Death using different computer algorithms. Currently supports user-supplied mappings, and provides unvalidated, experimental-stage mapping definitions to transform to InterVA4, Tariff 2, and InSilicoVA. This package is made available by WHO, in collaboration with Swiss Tropical and Public Health Institute.
